articles.author: Victor Tangermann
articles.title: Investors Dumping American Stocks as the Country Bets Everything on AI - Futurism
articles.description: Investors are starting to look elsewhere as the Trump administration continues to threaten the independence of its central bank.
articles.content:
For decades, the United States stock market has been a juggernaut on the international stage. The US dollar has been and still is the de facto currency globally.
But for how much longer that will be… [+2481 chars]

articles.author: Leana S. Wen
articles.title: Opinion | RFK Jr.’s attacks on vaccines just hit a wall of pediatricians - The Washington Post
articles.description: The American Academy of Pediatrics issuing its own vaccine guidance is not just symbolic.
articles.content: It should not be newsworthy for the American Academy of Pediatrics to issue vaccine recommendations, as it did last week. The organization, which represents about 67,000 pediatricians, has done so ev… [+70 chars]
